full_text:
Re: Last contact with Epstein
From
To Charisma Edge
Date 2019/08/11 00:47
Subject: Re: Last contact with Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822

Thanks. Feel free to contact me if you need anything at all. 917669(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Sent from my iPhone

On Aug 10, 2019, at 7:21 PM, Charisma Edge (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov> wrote:

Thank you(b)(6); (b)(7)(C). I appreciate you taking the time to forward this information....Please enjoy your time and family....

Charisma Edge
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
646-826-6300 ext (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov
NYM/AW-Programs-@bop.gov

>>>(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@aol.com> 8/10/2019 8:28 PM >>>
I visited inmate Epstein in SHU on Thursday. He was getting ready to meet with his attorneys for the day so I had gone to visit him right after the SHU meeting. He had a cell mate at the time with whom I saw him interact with. He did not report any mental health concerns and he denied any suicidal thoughts or intention. He was asking this writer to go to general population and was making requests for various needs he had at the time. He wanted social calls without them being on a speaker phone. He wanted a book he had left in the suicide watch area. His mood was not depressed or anxious. There were no signs of distress. He had planned on meeting with his attorneys to work on his legal situation.

Sent from my iPhone

<Charisma Edge.vcf>

Page 2772

>>>(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@aol.com> 8/10/2019 8:28 PM >>>
I visited inmate Epstein in SHU on Thursday. He was getting ready to meet with his attorneys for the day so I had gone to visit him right after the SHU meeting. He had a cell mate at the time with whom I saw him interact with. He did not report any mental health concerns and he denied any suicidal thoughts or intention. He was asking this writer to go to general population and was making requests for various needs he had at the time. He wanted social calls without them being on a speaker phone. He wanted a book he had left in the suicide watch area. His mood was not depressed or anxious. There were no signs of distress. He had planned on meeting with his attorneys to work on his legal situation.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C). The email is discussing the last contact with Epstein, detailing his mental state and requests.
